segments.text: Pardon me . Could you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am looking for a sweater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here . How do you like this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's pretty . Can I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can try it on in the fitting room over there .
segments.speaker: S2
